text:
Our family go to for Thai food and occasional family dinner since 2004. Food is great, on top of a good service and affordable pricing.

Recommended dishes:
Squid with flour
Pandan chicken
Chicken basil leave
Pad Thai
And red ruby dessert
They offer a vegetarian menu. I tried the vegetarian fried rice and it was not bad.

I recently visited Pattaya Garden Restaurant and while the experience was good, it didn't fully live up to the expectations. The price was a little on the higher side considering the quality of the food. The green curry had a nice depth of flavor but wasn‚Äôt as aromatic or spicy as I would have liked. The tom yum soup was decent but lacked the strong kick I typically enjoy.

One positive was the fact that they offer halal options, which is great for those who need it. I also saw that they provide catering services, which could be handy for larger events. The omelette was good, fluffy, and tasty, though not spectacular.

While the pandan dessert was a nice touch, it didn‚Äôt have the intensity of flavour I was expecting. The prawn dishes were decent, but not particularly noteworthy.

In terms of value, it felt like you were paying a bit too much for the portion sizes, especially considering the taste didn‚Äôt blow me away. Overall, it's a solid option, but I would only return if I‚Äôm in the area or looking for halal dishes specifically.

When my friend Jun told me that their Pad Thai was one of the best he ever had. I doubted him greatly ü§îü§î

After reading through the review by another reviewer D. boey, I formed a good impression and wanted to try it for myself ‚≠êÔ∏è

Lo and behold, I tried it myself and I am glad to say that it was one of the best Pad Thai I ever had!! Keep it up üëçüëçüëçüëç

I am going to bring my friends here too!

5/5 ‚≠êÔ∏è Approved by Jarome

Food was pretty good for the price. The Green Curry is really rich and coconut-y. The omelette (I got with onion) is simple but yummy as well. The Pad Kapow was a bit disappointing though, as it doesn‚Äôt taste like Pad Kapow. Overall, would go back.
